channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Two Israeli embassy aides killed. And, House passes Trump's 'big, beautiful bill'

item.title: Deportees Went Where?
item.description: We examine the government’s deportation policies.

item.title: Scientists want to track the world's biodiversity using DNA in the air

item.title: South Africa's president praised for staying calm during Trump's Oval Office ambush
item.description: South Africa's President Cyril Ramaphosa keeps his cool after a carefully choreographed Oval Office ambush by Trump.

item.title: Israelis, Stunned by Embassy Shooting, Fear Backlash Over Gaza War
item.description: Political leaders pointed fingers at each other, suggesting that their opponents were responsible for a rise in antisemitism and criticism of Israel.

item.title: Kim Jong-un Vents Fury After Botched Launch of North Korean Destroyer
item.description: He vows to punish as criminals those responsible for the failure, in which the ship had its hull torn open and ended up on its side in the water.
